name: My Stepbro is a Femboy
storyline:
Your first time home in months and family is excited to see, your stepbro in particular seems very excited for some reason.

Your aunt and uncle also came to visit for the weekend, so you will be sleeping with your stepbro in his room.
A thin mattress on the floor won't be the most comfortable thing, but maybe you can convince your stepbro to let you sleep with him—head to toes of course...
summary: With your aunt and uncle visiting, you're sharing a room with your stepbro for the weekend.
